column1: #Text=" Sokka says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm making it so they ca n't stop us .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Way to think ahead .
#Text=" Suki says : " We 're on our way !
#Text=" Suki says : " This is a rematch I 've been waiting for .
#Text=" Gondola guard says : " There 's the warden !
#Text=" Gondola guard says : " He wants us to cut the line .
#Text=" Gondola guard # 2 says : " But if we cut the line , there 's no way he 'll survive !
#Text=" Gondola guard says : " He knows that .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " They 're about to cut the line !
#Text=" Azula says : " Then it 's time to leave .
#Text=" Zuko says : " They 're cutting the line !
#Text=" Hakoda says : " I hope this thing floats .
#Text=" Gondola guard # 3 says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=" Mai says : " Saving the jerk who dumped me .
#Text=" Azula says : " What is she doing ?
